name: loftily
content:
Add to word list

in a way that shows you think you are better than other people: "Your views are too simplistic for me," said the young politician loftily. He loftily dismissed Ferguson's words as meaningless. See
lofty
More examplesFewer examples"He's got no taste," one showbiz critic loftily claimed."Your private life is none of my concern," she said loftily.Jane had once invited a bank manager to Christmas Eve drinks, which he had loftily declined.
